short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your ChatGPT experience with quick access to frequently used prompts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Prompt Snippets is a Google Chrome Extension that helps you manage and utilize prompt snippets conveniently when using ChatGPT. It provides a dialog interface where you can search and select prompt snippets to be inserted into the input area of ChatGPT.

It is open-source software, and you can view its source code at the following link:

- https://github.com/kohkimakimoto/chatgpt-prompt-snippets-chrome-extension

I also wrote a blog post describing this extension:

- https://dev.to/kohkimakimoto/chrome-extension-chatgpt-prompt-snippets-2gkb

Changelog:
v0.0.5: Fixed an issue where the extension did not work with the latest version of Chrome.
v0.0.4: Fixed an issue where the extension failed to insert a snippet due to changes in the textarea implementation on the ChatGPT website.
v0.0.3: Update the manifest to accommodate the new ChatGPT domain chatgpt.com.
